translation.en: No! Fucking fuckity fucking fucking fuck!
I'm sorry. I'm sorry!
No! No!
- Don't! No! -
Wow. Wow, wow!
Well, this is weird.
All right. What…
Hello?
Nope, nothing?
Yaah… all right.
What do we do, Jaskier? What do we do in situations like this? We…
translation.es: Bien, Jaskier, ¿qué hacemos en estos casos? Bueno…

translation.en: we revert to the basics.
Hello!
Hello!
- Hello, Sandpiper. - Aah! Aah…
This is new.
Uh, for the record, I'm not…
I'm not not into it.
translation.es: no es que no me guste.

translation.en: Good- looking man, nice boots.
Am I dead?
Aah! Ow, ow!
Not dead.
I'm getting that.
So you… you are something else.
You're a Doppler.
Not a Doppler.
What are you?
I am many things. Many faces. Many places.
translation.es: Soy muchas cosas. Muchas caras. Muchos lugares.

translation.en: - Then why do you look like me? - Because you love yourself.
translation.es: - ¿Por qué luces como yo? - Por tu vanidad.

translation.en: I have other faces.
If you prefer.
Better?
Oh… Whoa…
Yep. Yeah.
Wonderful.
Why did you save me from the Temerians?
translation.es: ¿Por qué me salvaste de los temerianos?

translation.en: I need you to sing a story back to life.
translation.es: Necesito que vuelvas a cantar una historia.

translation.en: We're related, you and I.
You're a bard. I am a storyteller.
translation.es: Tú eres un bardo, y yo una cuentacuentos.

translation.en: - Of a sort. -
I beg to differ. You-- you are a time- stopping, shape- shifting,
translation.es: Discrepo. Eres una especie de cuentacuentos que para el tiempo,

translation.en: probably- gonna- eat- me- without- salt at- some- point sort of storyteller.
translation.es: que cambia de formas y que quizá me coma sin echarme sal.

translation.en: I-- I'm just-- I'm just a man, with an admittedly… fun hat. We're not the same. You're--
translation.es: Yo solo soy un hombre con un sombrero claramente divertido.

translation.en: I slip between worlds and times, collecting forgotten stories.
translation.es: Recorro mundos y tiempos coleccionando historias olvidadas.

translation.en: I bring them back to life when the world needs them.
translation.es: Y las revivo cuando las necesitan.

translation.en: Are you sure you've got the right man for this?
Of course I am.
You're the Sandpiper.
Smuggler of elves to safety.
The Sandpiper's a name. It's a title. I'm just a bard.
translation.es: Es un nombre, un título. Solo soy un bardo.

translation.en: A bard the Scoia'tael risked attacking a Temerian army camp to save.
translation.es: Los Scoia'tael atacaron un campamento temeriano para salvarte.

translation.en: They know you care for them. Their struggle for justice.
translation.es: Saben que te importa su lucha por la justicia.

translation.en: I do.
The Scoia'tael mean well,
but elfkind cannot win fuelled by pain and anger alone.
translation.es: pero los elfos no pueden ganar alimentados solo por el dolor y la ira.

translation.en: Hope is vital.
The elves need a story lost to time. One of the few who overcame the many.
translation.es: Necesitan la historia olvidada de los pocos que vencieron a muchos.

translation.en: The Story of the Seven.
The St… the Story of…
Let me guess.
A bunch of warriors join forces to fight against all odds.
translation.es: Un grupo de guerreros se unen para luchar contra viento y marea.

translation.en: It has been done to death.
translation.es: La han repetido hasta el cansancio.

translation.en: Has it?
Seven estranged warriors who come together to fight an unstoppable empire,
translation.es: Siete guerreros que se unieron para luchar contra un imperio imparable,

translation.en: bring humans and monsters to the world via the Conjunction of the Spheres,
translation.es: traer humanos y monstruos al mundo a través de la Conjunción de las Esferas

translation.en: and create the very first version of a witcher.
translation.es: y crear la primera versión de un brujo.

translation.en: That's been done to death?
No. No, no, I've-- I've not heard that one, admittedly.
translation.es: No, de hecho, no había escuchado esa historia.

translation.en: Wow!
That's very different.
This is really fun.
You're telling me that the first version of a witcher was a badass elf?
translation.es: ¿Dices que la primera versión de un brujo fue un elfo rudo?

translation.en: This is really gonna piss Geralt off.
translation.es: Geralt se molestará mucho cuando lo sepa.

translation.en: All right.
Where do we start?
It all began twelve hundred years ago.
In the Elven golden era.
translation.es: en la era dorada de los elfos,

translation.en: Before the arrival of humans and monsters in the world.
translation.es: antes de que los humanos y los monstruos llegaran.

translation.en: Six lone outcasts,
strangers to each other,
translation.es: que no se conocían entre sí,

translation.en: destined to be bound together in a blood quest.
translation.es: estaban destinados a unirse en una misión mortal.

translation.en: Fjall of Dog Clan.
Scían of Ghost Tribe.
Brother Death.
The mages Zacaré and Syndril.
Meldof and her vengeful hammer, Gwen.
translation.es: Meldof y Gwen, su martillo vengativo.

translation.en: Soon to be led by the seventh.
translation.es: Pronto serían liderados por la séptima,

translation.en: The one they called the Lark.
translation.es: que era conocida como la Alondra.

translation.en: Good morning. Alms for an ex- soldier?
translation.es: Buenos días. ¿Una limosna para un exsoldado?

translation.en: Thank you.
Do they have music here?
Hasn't been music on the island in years.
translation.es: Hace años que no hay música en la isla.

translation.en: Good luck.
- - You too.
♪ A flower shall grow ♪
♪ Where our peasant blood flows ♪
♪ Our lives they have taken ♪
♪ Are the seeds they have sown ♪
♪ Rise up from the soil we till ♪
♪ Rise up from the soil that they own ♪
translation.es: Levántense del suelo que les pertenece.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black Rose ♪
- ♪ Let no one doubt our cause… ♪ - Oh!
translation.es: Que nadie dude de nuestra causa…

translation.en: My.
Aren't you the pretty young bud?
- ♪ Another will grow… ♪ - I'd say you're ripe for flowering.
translation.es: Estás lista para que te haga mujer.

translation.en: Ithlinne is not right, sir. She has fits.
translation.es: Ithlinne no está bien, señor. Tiene convulsiones.

translation.en: Please, let her go. You can all drink for free.
- - Ma!
I'll fucking stop you!  Fucking come on!
Sorry, friends.
Can't abide bad manners.
To the Lark!
The Lark!
♪ We are the Black Rose ♪
- ♪ Let no one doubt our cause ♪ -
translation.es: Que nadie dude de nuestra causa.

translation.en: ♪ Rise up and let them hear our roar ♪
translation.es: Levántense, y que escuchen nuestro rugido.

translation.en: ♪ The lowborns' day has come ♪
translation.es: Llegó el día de la baja cuna.

translation.en: Go on, you girl!
Far south from Inis Dubh,
translation.es: Lejos al sur de Inis Dubh,

translation.en: the newly crowned King Alvitir, determined to be seen amongst his people,
translation.es: el reciente rey Alvitir, decidido a ser visto entre su gente,

translation.en: toured the lowborn streets,
translation.es: recorrió las calles de la baja cuna

translation.en: despite the threat of assassins from other kingdoms.
translation.es: a pesar de la amenaza de asesinos extranjeros.

translation.en: Protect the king!
But first they would have to get through the royal protectors, Dog Clan.
translation.es: Pero primero debían atravesar a la guardia real, el Clan del Perro.

translation.en: And their greatest warrior…
…Fjall Stoneheart.
Princess!
I've got you.
Get away!
Down!
Like I showed you.
- Good? - Good.
Enter.
- Apologies. - It's all right, Fjall.
Decorum be damned.
Dog Clan sealed the palace.
No one's in or out until we find out who's behind this.
Now, I want you to hang on to this.
translation.es: Quiero que se quede con esto.

translation.en: Just for now.
You saved us.
You saved me.
You saved yourself.
You've always been there when I've needed you.
It's my duty.
Well, we both know that it's more than that.
translation.es: Ambos sabemos que es más que eso.

translation.en: - We agreed. -
You might be able to forget, but I can't.
translation.es: Quizá puedas olvidarlo, pero yo no.

translation.en: I haven't forgotten.
- If we'd have been caught-- - But we weren't.
translation.es: - Si nos descubrieran… - Pero no pasó.

translation.en: Fjall, I nearly died today.
I won't die living a lie.
I was born to be your protector.
So protect me.
No markings on the assassins. Captain Eredin is rounding up suspects for interrogation.
translation.es: Los asesinos no tenían marcas. Eredin juntó a los sospechosos.

translation.en: Eredin doesn't know his arse from his elbow.
translation.es: Eredin es un bueno para nada.

translation.en: Fuck him and his shiny army. Where the fuck were they today when it counted?
translation.es: A la mierda con todos ellos. ¿Dónde diablos estaban hoy?

translation.en: Couldn't organize a ride in a brothel.
translation.es: No sabe ni organizar una salida a un burdel.

translation.en: Where's Fjall?
Fuck.
Just kill me. Be done with it.
No. You need to suffer.
In disgrace.
New king, assassins waitin' in every shadow,
translation.es: Tenemos un rey nuevo. Está lleno de asesinos, y no puedes ni controlar tu verga.

translation.en: and you couldn't even keep control of your cock.
translation.es: Está lleno de asesinos, y no puedes ni controlar tu verga.

translation.en: Thank the gods Kareg didn't live to see you betray your own clan.
translation.es: Gracias a los dioses que Kerrick no vivió para ver tal traición.

translation.en: I know you wished he returned from battle that day instead of me.
translation.es: Sé que deseas que él hubiera regresado en vez de mí.

translation.en: I never said that.
Didn't have to.
I've wished the same every day since.
translation.es: He querido lo mismo desde entonces.

translation.en: I needed both of you by my side.
translation.es: Los necesitaba a ambos a mi lado.

translation.en: He was taken, and you were supposed to take over as chieftain.
translation.es: Él murió, y se suponía que tú debías tomar el cargo de cacique.

translation.en: But you betrayed your clan.
Your oath. You betrayed me.
translation.es: Traicionaste tu juramento. Y me traicionaste a mí.

translation.en: The border.
Aye.
Let's be done with it.
you have broken your oath as royal protector
translation.es: rompiste tu juramento como protector real

translation.en: and betrayed your birth clan.
You are hereby banished from Xin'trea.
Dog Clan disown you.
translation.es: El Clan del Perro te deshereda.

translation.en: As do I.
You'll die forgotten. And unspoken.
Goodbye, Father.
- Shall I guess? -
The Solryth Sagas.
Don't mock, brother.
You're obsessed. You need at least one friend who isn't a book.
translation.es: Estás obsesionada. Necesitas un amigo que no sea un libro.

translation.en: I don't know how you live like this. Mm-- The smell alone.
translation.es: No sé cómo vives así. No aguanto ni el olor.

translation.en: All this is our future. What has happened will happen again.
translation.es: Todo esto es nuestro futuro. Lo que pasó volverá a pasar.

translation.en: - Oh, you're a seer now. - No.
I just don't deny what's in front of my own eyes.
translation.es: Solo no niego lo que tengo enfrente.

translation.en: Dwarven script, fifteen hundred years old,
telling of Solryth's arrival.
translation.es: habla de la llegada de Solryth.

translation.en: The siege of their city before she drove them out
translation.es: El asedio de su ciudad antes de que ella los echara

translation.en: and built Xin'trea on its ruins.
translation.es: y construyera Xin'trea en sus ruinas.

translation.en: History is all around us, brother,
reminding us how brilliant we once were,
translation.es: Nos recuerda lo brillantes que fuimos

translation.en: and how brilliant we can be again if we try.
translation.es: y que podemos volver a serlo si lo intentamos.

translation.en: I could be of use to you, you know.
As an-- an adviser--
The generals and mages would eat you alive.
translation.es: Los generales y los magos te comerían viva.

translation.en: But there is a role for you, sister, in all of this.
translation.es: Pero tienes un papel que cumplir en todo esto, hermana.

translation.en: Now that your little indiscretion with Fjall has been taken care of,
translation.es: Ahora que ya resolvimos tu indiscreción con Fjall,

translation.en: it's time to look to the future.
- I've found a worthy suitor for you. -
The king of Pryshia is a widower.
translation.es: El rey de Pryshia es viudo.

translation.en: A marriage between our kingdoms would make him amenable to signing.
translation.es: Un matrimonio entre nuestros reinos lo convencería de firmar.

translation.en: Of course. Whatever… you need to achieve peace.
translation.es: Por supuesto. Lo que necesites para lograr la paz.

translation.en: A brighter future. Thanks to you.
translation.es: Tendremos un mejor futuro gracias a ti.

translation.en: Queen Merwyn of Pryshia.
Deep in the Valley of Lost Souls,
translation.es: En el Valle de las Almas Perdidas,

translation.en: a lone warrior sought answers to the strange skies
translation.es: una guerrera solitaria buscaba respuestas al raro cielo

translation.en: that had suddenly cast their ominous shadow across the land.
translation.es: que había esparcido su funesta sombra por la tierra.

translation.en: But her ancestors remained silent.
Nothing like this had ever happened before.
For another had learned to tear the veils between worlds.
translation.es: Porque otra persona había aprendido a rasgar los velos entre mundos.

translation.en: I've returned.
Defeated or victorious, Chief Sage Balor?
My assassination attempt failed.
I need your help.
So tell me, how did you learn to fight?
I was born into Raven Clan.
translation.es: Nací en el Clan del Cuervo.

translation.en: No! You were a protector?
Indeed.
Loyal bodyguard to King Midir and the royal family of Pryshia.
translation.es: Fui guardaespaldas del rey Midir y la familia real de Pryshia.

translation.en: So you must know Lady Cethlenn of the Knives.
She's my mother.
- What? -
What are you doing here?
You could be at the palace with the kings and queens and heroes.
translation.es: Podrías estar en el palacio con los reyes, las reinas y los héroes.

translation.en: I chose this path.
When I was a young girl,
my sword master had a key harp on her wall.
translation.es: mi maestra de armas tenía una viola de teclas.

translation.en: I fell in love with it.
My mother tried to save me, but I was lost to the music.
translation.es: Mi madre intentó salvarme, pero la música me conquistó.

translation.en: And so I became a roving bard.
translation.es: Así que me convertí en un bardo errante.

translation.en: Here.
I wish I had a calling for something like that.
All I have is a sickness.
translation.es: Lo único que tengo es una enfermedad.

translation.en: I have visions, fits,
and the people in the town are scared of me.
translation.es: Y la gente del pueblo me tiene miedo.

translation.en: The ignorant are always jealous of anyone with gifts.
translation.es: Los ignorantes envidian a aquellos con dones.

translation.en: - - Open up!
- Or we'll burn this hole to the ground. - Oh, shit.
translation.es: Abran, o quemaremos la casa. Mierda.

translation.en: Why do assholes run to town guards when they get their asses kicked?
translation.es: Siempre llaman a los guardias cuando les ganan.

translation.en: Singing, my ass!
Dog Clan? What the fuck?
Hey!
Aah. One of Cethlenn's scrawny little ravens.
Better a scrawny raven than one of Osfar's mangy bitches.
translation.es: Mejor que una perra sarnosa de Osfar.

translation.en: Huh?
Aye. Probably right there, Raven.
- The name's-- - Fjall Stoneheart. Son of Osfar.
translation.es: - Soy… - Fjall Stoneheart, hijo de Osfar.

translation.en: I remember that pendant
from when you took my cousin's eye in the Battle of Brokilon.
translation.es: Dejaste tuerta a mi prima en la Batalla de Brokilón.

translation.en: I swore to her I'd kill you if we ever crossed paths again.
translation.es: Le juré que te mataría si nos topábamos.

translation.en: I see. And I don't even remember you.
translation.es: Ya veo. - Y tú eres… - La que te enterrará bajo la arcilla.

translation.en: I'm the one who sends you to the clay.
translation.es: - Y tú eres… - La que te enterrará bajo la arcilla.

translation.en: Relax.
My Dog Clan days are done.
translation.es: Se acabaron mis días en el Clan del Perro.

translation.en: Horseshit.
No one leaves Dog Clan.
And yet here I am,
earning my fortune as a sellsword on a poxy island at the edge of the world.
translation.es: Trabajando como mercenario en una isla del último rincón del mundo.

translation.en: What the fuck's a Raven Clan warrior doing so far north?
translation.es: ¿Qué hace una guerrera del Clan del Cuervo acá?

translation.en: Not a warrior. I'm a bard.
translation.es: No soy una guerrera. Soy un bardo.

translation.en: A Raven Clan bard?
That's a first.
Wait.
You're not the Lark everyone round here's been goin' on about?
translation.es: ¿Acaso eres la Alondra de la que todos hablan?

translation.en: I'd planned to come see you sing myself. If not for the current circumstances.
translation.es: Planeaba verte pronto, de no ser por mi situación actual.

translation.en: How did the son of mighty Osfar fall so far?
translation.es: ¿Cómo cayó tan bajo el hijo del gran Osfar?

translation.en: Easy.
Fucked the princess.
Horseshit. Your head'd be on a pike rotting over the city gate.
translation.es: Sí, claro. Te hubieran ejecutado en público.

translation.en: And embarrass the Crown?
Better I be stripped of my clan and banished in silent disgrace.
translation.es: Mejor me echaron de mi clan y me exiliaron en silencio.

translation.en: Can't blame them.
Protect, not fuck. Clan basics. - - Should have got that one tattooed.
translation.es: - Proteger, no follar. Es algo básico. - Debí habérmelo tatuado.

translation.en: Too long a phrase for a Dog Clan cock.
translation.es: No te hubiera cabido en el pene.

translation.en: I'll remember that when your head rolls to a bloody stop in the mud.
translation.es: Lo recordaré cuando te corten la cabeza.

translation.en: Looks like we've ran out of time.
You, back against the far wall.
translation.es: Tú, contra la pared del fondo.

translation.en: And you, your freedom's been bought.
- What? - You heard me.
Well,
many thanks for not trying to kill me in my sleep.
translation.es: Gracias por no matarme mientras dormía.

translation.en: There's still time.
- An eye for an eye. -
I said back against the wall!
Fare thee well, Lark.
May the executioner's blade be keen and quick.
translation.es: Que la espada del verdugo sea afilada y rápida.

translation.en: Actually, fuck it.
I don't give a shit.
Report.
The Pryshians have been running some harrying raids. Testing our lines.
translation.es: Los pryshianos han estado atacando para probar nuestras líneas.

translation.en: If we offer the dwarves access to our Xin'trean mines,
translation.es: Si les damos a los enanos acceso a nuestras minas, podremos…

translation.en: - we can count their alliance to our-- - No. No.
translation.es: Si les damos a los enanos acceso a nuestras minas, podremos… No, no puedo luchar una guerra en dos frentes

translation.en: I cannot fight a war on two fronts and keep my kingdom from starving.
translation.es: No, no puedo luchar una guerra en dos frentes y alimentar a mi reino.

translation.en: I've a new plan.
End the Thousand- Year War.
translation.es: Terminar con la Guerra de los Mil Años.

translation.en: I've already sent emissaries to Pryshia and Darwen.
translation.es: Envié emisarios a Pryshia y Darwen. Firmaremos el tratado aquí.

translation.en: - A peace treaty is to be signed here. - Preposterous.
translation.es: Envié emisarios a Pryshia y Darwen. Firmaremos el tratado aquí. Eso es absurdo.

translation.en: - It'll be our end! - Sire.
Pryshia and Darwen will never sign. - This war-- - Will end.
translation.es: Señor, Pryshia y Darwen nunca firmarán. Esta guerra…

translation.en: They're as stretched to breaking as we are.
translation.es: Va a terminar. Están tan mal como nosotros.

translation.en: My sister is to be married to King Midir.
translation.es: Mi hermana se casará con el rey Midir.

translation.en: Our mines in Sliabh Liath will be gifted to Queen Neera.
translation.es: Le daremos las minas de Sliabh Liath a la reina Neera.

translation.en: They will sign.
What say you, Chief Sage?
Apologies, Captain Eredin.
The role of chief sage is no longer one of adviser to the throne.
translation.es: El papel del gran sabio ya no es aconsejar al trono,

translation.en: I'm merely here to advise on matters of magic.
translation.es: sino solo asesorar sobre temas mágicos.

translation.en: If we keep warring as we are,
translation.es: Si seguimos luchando como hasta ahora,

translation.en: famine and the stench of defeat will be our only legacy.
translation.es: el hambre y la derrota será nuestro único legado.

translation.en: - Sire-- - This peace treaty will happen.
Dismissed.
- ♪ Ay, oh, the big puck goes… ♪ - Fjall!
translation.es: - Ey, uy, va el duende Puck… - ¡Fjall!

translation.en: It's good to see you.
- Did you bribe the guards? - Listen.
Osfar wants you to return immediately. There's to be a peace treaty.
translation.es: Osfar quiere que regreses. Habrá un tratado de paz.

translation.en: The king's arranged a signing between the kingdoms.
translation.es: El rey aseguró las firmas entre los reinos.

translation.en: The answer's no, little cousin.
- Where are you going? - To find the nearest brothel.
What'll I tell your father?
Tell him I'm too busy dying, forgotten and unspoken.
Now go home, Shen!
Good elves of Inis Dubh.
Are you well? Because you're looking well.
I have but a few hours left on this shithole of an island.
translation.es: Solo me quedan unas horas en esta isla de mierda.

translation.en: Who wants to ply me with the finest skril and unspeakable debauchery, huh?
translation.es: ¿Quién quiere llenarme con el mejor skril y el desenfreno más pervertido?

translation.en: Behind these doors lies a veritable cornucopia
translation.es: Tras estas puertas hay una verdadera abundancia

translation.en: of delectable depravities and unmentionable delights.
translation.es: de depravaciones exquisitas y placeres innombrables.

translation.en: But first we must address the sordid issue of coin.
translation.es: Pero primero debemos abordar el despreciable tema del dinero.

translation.en: Ah, yes.
My word is my coin.
Your word affords you…
naught but the greasing of a cat's arse.
translation.es: apenas para acariciar a un gato.

translation.en: - Sylanya, go find Fluffy! - Hup- hup- hup.
I can pay in silver.
Fuck.
Ah, yes.
We'll make a player of you yet…
Never really understood why you chose this thing over an honest blade.
translation.es: Nunca entendí por qué elegiste esto en vez de una buena espada.

translation.en: It's so… fragile.
You've not changed.
You have.
Mother sent me to bring you home.
The Continent's changing beneath our feet.
Your king's travelling to Xin'trea to sign a treaty. We need your skills.
translation.es: Tu rey viajará a Xin'trea para firmar un tratado. Te necesitamos.

translation.en: I no longer follow the way of the blade.
translation.es: Ya no sigo el camino de la espada.

translation.en: And yet…
She's really willing to forgive me?
Cethlenn needs you. This is your chance to redeem yourself, sister.
translation.es: Cethlenn te necesita. Es tu oportunidad para redimirte, hermana.

translation.en: I can't.
I can't do those things again.
translation.es: No puedo volver a hacer esas cosas.

translation.en: How can you live like this? Don't you miss it?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puedes vivir así? ¿No extrañas tu hogar?

translation.en: I miss you.
Desperately.
Then come back to us.
The others said this would be a waste of time.
translation.es: Me dijeron que desperdiciaría mi tiempo.

translation.en: Help me prove them wrong, sister.
translation.es: Ayúdame a demostrarles que están equivocados, hermana.

translation.en: It's your last chance. I sail on the next tide.
translation.es: Es tu última oportunidad. Navegaré con la próxima marea.

translation.en: Are you all right?
The time of the spheres is upon us.
translation.es: Se acerca el tiempo de las esferas.

translation.en: Worlds will eat worlds. Emerald skies. Fire will summon a new dawn.
translation.es: Mundos se comerán a otros mundos. Cielos esmeralda. Un nuevo amanecer.

translation.en: A great beast born shall be slain by your blade.
translation.es: Una gran bestia nacida será asesinada por tu espada.

translation.en: Two apart shall become two as one.
translation.es: Dos separados serán dos en uno.

translation.en: The Lark's most precious notes
translation.es: Las notas más preciadas de la Alondra

translation.en: shall be the key to all things.
And a quest in the name of your clan will bring you redemption.
translation.es: Y una misión en nombre de tu clan te dará la redención.

translation.en: Ithlinne said I'd find redemption in a quest for my clan.
translation.es: Ithlinne dijo que hallaría redención en una misión de mi clan.

translation.en: Her visions, have any of them ever come true?
translation.es: ¿Se han cumplido alguna de sus visiones?

translation.en: All of them.
One way or another.
Here. Give this to her when she wakes.
Tell her I'm… sorry I couldn't wait to say goodbye.
translation.es: Dile que lamento no haber podido despedirme.

translation.en: - Hopefully, our paths will cross some day. - Where's the road takin' you?
To seek redemption.
Niamh!
Can't let you travel alone.
Some wicked elf might steal your virtue.
translation.es: Un elfo malo podría aprovecharse de ti.

translation.en: Not enough to have a musician sister. Now I must suffer a shit jester too.
translation.es: No bastaba con una hermana música, debo aguantar a una bufona también.

translation.en: Don't make me change my mind, wench.
translation.es: No me hagas cambiar de opinión, zorra.

translation.en: As if anyone's capable of that.
translation.es: Como si alguien pudiera hacer eso.

translation.en: I'm just glad you're--
No!
Show yourselves, you fucking bastards!
That's my fuckin' pendant.
Skills!
I hate runnin'.
What the fuck are you doing here?
Lookin' for a boat off this shithole.
You're welcome, by the way.
Who's the warrior?
My sister.
What the fuck?
This mark.
Xin'trean army. Fifth column.
I know her.
She's a cavalry captain in the Pryshian army.
translation.es: Es capitana de caballería de Pryshia.

translation.en: A Darwenish infantry dagger.
It makes no sense.
Why are soldiers from three kingdoms at war working together to kill us?
translation.es: ¿Por qué se unirían para matarnos soldados de tres reinos en guerra?

translation.en: The treaty.
- Niamh came to tell me about a treaty. - I know. I was sent for too.
translation.es: - Niamh mencionó un tratado. - También vinieron por mí.

translation.en: - Shit! - Someone didn't want clan warriors there.
It's the armies, they're finally making a move against the monarchies.
translation.es: Los ejércitos quieren derrocar a las monarquías.

translation.en: - I need to get to Xin'trea, warn my clan. - So do I.
translation.es: - Debo advertirle a mi clan en Xin'trea. - Yo también.

translation.en: Fuck your clan.
Look, there are bound to be more of these stabby fuckers on the way.
translation.es: Seguro nos toparemos con más desgraciados en el camino.

translation.en: We'll have more chance if we stick together.
Despite you being a pain in me hole.
translation.es: A pesar de que seas una molestia.

translation.en: Fine.
Right.
But cross me and I'll feed your cock to the dogs.
translation.es: Pero les daré tu verga a los perros si me traicionas.

translation.en: I don't fucking trust you, Stoneheart. Nor I you…
translation.es: - No confío en ti, Stoneheart. - Ni yo en ti.

translation.en: Lark.
They killed my sister.
The Lark is dead.
My name is Éile.
We'll meet again in the halls of Caer Aenwyn, sister.
translation.es: Ya nos volveremos a ver en los pasillos de Caer Aenwyn.

translation.en: And so the Lark no longer soared alone.
translation.es: Y, así, la Alondra ya no volaba sola.

translation.en: One had become two.
translation.es: Una se había convertido en dos.

translation.en: Please.
Princess?
Ket, I fixed it! Solryth's eyes blaze once more.
translation.es: Ket, ¡lo arreglé! Los ojos de Solryth volvieron a brillar.

translation.en: We need to get you dressed.
Don't you see? When all hope was lost, they led her ships to this continent,
translation.es: Guiaron sus naves a este Continente cuando no había esperanza.

translation.en: and now they light our skies again.
It's a sign, Ket. Maybe there's hope for me too.
translation.es: Es una señal, Ket. Quizá también haya esperanza para mí.

translation.en: Your brother will have my guts if I don't make you look presentable in time to meet your future husband.
translation.es: Me castigarán si no la preparo para conocer a su futuro esposo.

translation.en: Yes, of course.
With highborn hostages exchanged between the warring kingdoms,
translation.es: Tras el intercambio de rehenes de alta cuna entre los reinos,

translation.en: the other monarchs had sailed to sign a treaty
translation.es: los monarcas se juntaron para firmar un tratado que terminaría

translation.en: that would finally end the Thousand- Year War.
translation.es: los monarcas se juntaron para firmar un tratado que terminaría con la Guerra de los Mil Años.

translation.en: King Midir of Pryshia and his Raven Clan warriors.
translation.es: El rey Midir de Pryshia y sus guerreros del Clan del Cuervo.

translation.en: Queen Neera of Darwen and her Serpent Clan warriors.
translation.es: La reina Neera de Darwen y sus guerreros del Clan de la Serpiente.

translation.en: And Alvitir, the brave architect of a new dawn for elfkind.
translation.es: Y Alvitir, el valiente arquitecto de un nuevo amanecer para los elfos.

translation.en: I love you, brother.
Warriors of Xin'trea.
Thanks to the bravery of our royal guests,
translation.es: gracias a la valentía de nuestros invitados reales,

translation.en: today shall see our long, dark night of war and hunger end at last.
translation.es: hoy al fin veremos el término de la larga noche de guerra y hambruna.

translation.en: A new dawn will rise upon the Continent for all elfkind.
translation.es: Se alzará un nuevo amanecer sobre el Continente para todos los elfos.

translation.en: Famine replaced by peace and prosperity.
translation.es: La hambruna será reemplazada por la paz y la prosperidad,

translation.en: A united Continent once again.
translation.es: y el Continente volverá a estar unido.

translation.en: - A Continent of possibility. -
We are Xin'trean.
We are Pryshian.
We are Darwenish.
- But we will all be… - Your Majesty?
- Summon the physic. - No. - It's just… nerves. - …one, as strong and…
translation.es: - Trae al médico. - No, deben ser los nervios.

translation.en: Perhaps I should retire to my chambers.
…day we first landed on these shores and civilized this land.
translation.es: …cuando llegamos a estas costas y civilizamos esta tierra.

translation.en: So I call upon…
gracious Queen Neera of Darwen,
translation.es: a la amable reina Neera de Darwen

translation.en: and good King Midir of Pryshia…
translation.es: y al buen rey Midir de Pryshia.

translation.en: to join with me as allies in this new dawn.
translation.es: Acompáñenme como aliados en este nuevo amanecer.

translation.en: What's that?
Fire!
In that moment, the Elven world had changed forever.
translation.es: En ese momento, el mundo de los elfos cambió para siempre.

translation.en: A thousand years of monarchies, kingdoms, and clans were erased.
translation.es: Mil años de monarquías, reinos y clanes fueron borrados.

translation.en: It's done.
Indeed.
My beast has done well.
translation.es: Mi bestia lo hizo muy bien.

translation.en: The peace treaty had allowed Balor
translation.es: Balor usó el tratado de paz para poner a magos y generales belicosos

translation.en: to turn war- hungry mages and generals against their monarchies.
translation.es: Balor usó el tratado de paz para poner a magos y generales belicosos en contra de sus monarquías.

translation.en: It was just the beginning.
Empress.
The three kingdoms are yours.
All hail the new Golden Empire.
Rise.
We have much to do.
This storm's unnatural.
We're sailing for safe harbor in Gaylth.
translation.es: El barco buscará refugio en Gaylth.

translation.en: That's not even close to Xin'trea.
translation.es: Eso está muy lejos de Xin'trea.

translation.en: We're no use to our clans at the bottom of the ocean.
translation.es: No podremos ayudar si nos ahogamos.

translation.en: Merwyn was free now.
Free to write her own story.
translation.es: Libre para escribir su propia historia,

translation.en: Just as her hero Solryth had.
translation.es: como lo había hecho su heroína Solryth.

translation.en: To start a new golden era.
translation.es: Ahora podría comenzar una nueva era dorada.

translation.en: This was her destiny.
Empress!
She plays her part well.
A shiny thing to appease the masses.
translation.es: Es una distracción para calmar a las masas.

translation.en: They all fall so eagerly into place, despite their world turning on its head.
translation.es: Aceptan muy bien que su mundo haya cambiado por completo.

translation.en: Faced with chaos, the people will always choose order.
translation.es: La gente siempre elige el orden antes que el caos.

translation.en: No matter the cost.
Or how blatant the farce.
translation.es: O el descaro de la farsa.

translation.en: How long do we need her?
We shall see.
Take me down to my people.
The skies and seas were not the only thing
translation.es: Los cielos y los mares no fueron lo único que cambió sin previo aviso.

translation.en: to have changed without warning.
translation.es: no fueron lo único que cambió sin previo aviso.

translation.en: What the fuck are those flags?
translation.es: ¿Y esas banderas? Nunca había visto ese escudo de armas.

translation.en: - I've never seen that crest before. - Not Pryshian. That's for sure.
translation.es: ¿Y esas banderas? Nunca había visto ese escudo de armas. Claramente no es pryshiano.

translation.en: Let's head to this tavern. Get some locals drunk, find out what's going on.
translation.es: Emborrachemos a un lugareño para averiguar qué pasa.

translation.en: With what coin, exactly?
Too long on the clan teat.
You need to cultivate some initiative, boy.
- Oof! - Sorry.
Come on, then!
At least she ended the war.
Not many'd have the stomach to kill your own kin.
translation.es: No muchos aguantarían matar a su familia.

translation.en: And her own brother, no less.
- Calling herself Empress Merwyn now. - Empress?
Wiped out the lot of 'em in one go.
translation.es: Los eliminó de un solo golpe.

translation.en: Useless royal bastards and their poxy clans.
translation.es: A la inútil realeza y a sus nefastos clanes.

translation.en: - She killed them all… - No.
That's impossible.
How does one princess no one's ever heard of
manage to take the whole Continent easy as piss like that?
translation.es: conquistar todo el Continente así como si nada?

translation.en: I heard she's got herself a three- headed beast, the size of a ship.
translation.es: Escuché que tiene una bestia de tres cabezas del tamaño de un barco.

translation.en: Sucks on her teat like a babe. - - Beast!
translation.es: - La amamanta como un bebé. - ¡Una bestia!

translation.en: A beast?
Lay off the godhead pipe.
Beast or no,
no Xin'trean bitch is gonna tell me I'm not Pryshian anymore.
translation.es: ninguna perra xin'treana me dirá que ya no soy pryshiano.

translation.en: Yeah, you lot are worse.
Paradin' around in your Pryshian armor mere suns ago.
translation.es: Hace apenas unos días usaban armadura pryshiana.

translation.en: Traitorous pissants, dressed in that cunt's armor.
translation.es: Son unos malditos traidores que usan la armadura de esa perra.

translation.en: Fuckin' slut's got you lot by the balls!
Anyone seen 'em?
Éile of Raven Clan, Fjall of Dog Clan.
translation.es: Éile del Clan del Cuervo y Fjall del Clan del Perro.

translation.en: - - We need to be smart about this.
If you can't control your fire because someone insulted your lover, we should part ways now.
translation.es: Si no aguantas que insulten a tu amante, deberíamos separarnos.

translation.en: - This has nothing to do with her. - This has everything to do with her.
translation.es: - Esto no tiene nada que ver con ella. - Claro que sí.

translation.en: She killed our clans.
One! Two!
One! Two!
- One… - You!
The largest we've excavated yet.
translation.es: Es el más grande hasta ahora.

translation.en: I need more power to stabilize the gateways.
translation.es: Necesito más energía para los portales.

translation.en: - How many monoliths have you raised? - Three in the north, two in the south.
translation.es: - ¿Cuántos monolitos llevas? - Tres en el norte, dos en el sur.

translation.en: Another five excavated being configured with Syndril's sigils.
translation.es: Y usamos los sellos de Syndril en otros cinco.

translation.en: Not enough to power a gateway for a legion. Why the delay?
translation.es: No es suficiente para una legión. ¿Por qué la demora?

translation.en: The empire's young.
Our troops are stretched thin.
You absorbed the entire Darwen and Pryshian army. How can you be stretched thin?
translation.es: ¿Cómo es posible? Tienes al ejército de Darwen y Pryshia.

translation.en: There were more deserters than anticipated.
translation.es: Hubo más desertores que los previstos.

translation.en: And since your purge of so many mages--
translation.es: Y desde tu purga de tantos magos…

translation.en: Non- cooperative mages.
Crop failures are worsening. Bread riots are running rampant--
translation.es: Las cosechas están empeorando, y los disturbios…

translation.en: Then quell them.
Those that make excuses don't make history.
translation.es: Los que inventan excusas no hacen historia.

translation.en: What of Fjall Stoneheart?
He escaped our assassins on Inis Dubh. - - Along with the Raven Clan warrior.
translation.es: Evitó a nuestros asesinos en Inis Dubh, junto con la guerrera del Clan del Cuervo.

translation.en: But we have elite troops scouring the Continent as we speak.
translation.es: Pero nuestras mejores tropas los están buscando.

translation.en: That's a heroic folktale waiting to happen.
translation.es: Se pueden convertir en un cuento heroico.

translation.en: End them. Now.
Horses are secure. I'll take first watch.
translation.es: Aseguré los caballos. Yo haré la primera guardia.

translation.en: Maybe some of them survived.
My clan would have fought to the death.
translation.es: Mi clan no se hubiera rendido.

translation.en: So would yours.
A monster.
How can that even exist? Where did it come from?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede existir algo así? ¿De dónde salió?

translation.en: There was a mage in Xin'trea.
He dug up and raised an ancient Dwarven monolith.
translation.es: Desenterró y levantó un monolito antiguo enano.

translation.en: He used it to… open up a gateway to another world.
translation.es: Lo usó para abrir un portal a otro mundo.

translation.en: - The monster came from there? - I mean, maybe.
- I know it sounds insane. - There are old stories of other worlds.
translation.es: - Suena loco. - Hay historias de otros mundos.

translation.en: And nothing's been right since.
translation.es: Hasta los cielos cambiaron desde ese momento.

translation.en: - Even the skies have changed. - And the seas too.
translation.es: Hasta los cielos cambiaron desde ese momento. Y los mares.

translation.en: Everything's off.
But even with the beast, Merwyn had no power to pull this off.
translation.es: Incluso con la bestia, Merwyn no tenía tanto poder.

translation.en: There has to be someone else behind this. The generals, or the mages--
translation.es: Debe haber alguien más. Los generales, los magos…

translation.en: - You're making excuses for her. - No.
If, now I mean if, she's Empress, then she was involved.
translation.es: Si en verdad es la emperatriz, entonces estuvo involucrada.

translation.en: She'll pay with her blood for what she did.
I should have died with my clan.
translation.es: Debí haber muerto con mi clan.

translation.en: Me too.
We're the last of us.
They'll erase our clans from history.
translation.es: Borrarán a nuestros clanes de la historia.

translation.en: Not as long as we breathe.
Then we end them before they end us.
Raven Clan.
Dog Clan.
How can we trust each other?
By the blade.
By the blade.
We find Merwyn, end her beast and anyone who stands with her.
translation.es: Encontraremos a Merwyn, y mataremos a su bestia y a sus secuaces.

translation.en: Send them all to clay.
Blood sworn.
To the end. To the end.
translation.es: - Hasta el final. - Hasta el final.

translation.en: Your brother. How could you?
I'd no choice, Ket. He'd written my life for me.
translation.es: No tenía opción. Quería controlar mi vida.

translation.en: I was destined for more.
Old stories are bound to repeat. They just need the right person to tell them.
translation.es: Las viejas historias se repiten. Solo necesitan al indicado para contarlas.

translation.en: When Solryth died, we turned on each other.
translation.es: Cuando Solryth murió, nos pusimos a pelear.

translation.en: A great golden era destroyed by an endless cycle of war.
translation.es: Una gran era dorada fue destruida por un ciclo interminable de guerra.

translation.en: And one my brother's treaty would have paused, at best.
translation.es: El tratado de mi hermano solo lo hubiera pausado.

translation.en: Balor and Eredin want to use Syndril's gateways
translation.es: Balor y Eredin quieren usar los portales de Syndril

translation.en: to conquer.
But conquest for conquest's sake means nothing.
translation.es: Pero conquistar solo por conquistar es inútil.

translation.en: I want to civilize these new worlds.
translation.es: Yo quiero civilizar estos nuevos mundos.

translation.en: Bring our art, our science, and culture to them,
translation.es: Quiero llevarles nuestro arte, nuestra ciencia y nuestra cultura.

translation.en: and create a new golden era for all of elfkind.
translation.es: Y crear una nueva era dorada para todos los elfos.

translation.en: You th--
You think you're Solryth.
Not yet.
Not while I remain Balor's puppet.
translation.es: No mientras siga siendo la marioneta de Balor.

translation.en: I need to become Empress in more than just name.
translation.es: Debo ser una emperatriz de verdad.

translation.en: Or all of this, every drop of blood spilled,
translation.es: O cada gota de sangre que se derramó por esto

translation.en: will have been in vain.
I just have to find a way.
What have I done?
You've unlocked the future, Syndril.
Without your knowledge, none of this would have been possible.
translation.es: Sin tu conocimiento, esto no habría sido posible.

translation.en: Now the master monolith is raised, who knows what worlds await?
translation.es: ¿Quién sabe qué mundos nos esperan con el monolito maestro?

translation.en: Ready your final calculations
to connect the rest of the monoliths across the empire.
translation.es: para conectar los demás monolitos del imperio.

translation.en: You should be proud.
This new dawn of possibilities is all thanks to you.
translation.es: Este amanecer de posibilidades es todo gracias a ti.

translation.en: I can't believe they united the armies.
translation.es: No puedo creer que unieran los ejércitos.

translation.en: The closer we get to Xin'trea, the worse our odds.
translation.es: Se nos irá poniendo más difícil.

translation.en: Then we change the odds with the best blade in the land.
translation.es: Pues pidámosle ayuda a la mejor espadachina.

translation.en: - Who? - My old sword master.
translation.es: ¿Quién? Mi antigua maestra. Si no me mata apenas me vea.

translation.en: If she doesn't kill me on sight.
translation.es: Mi antigua maestra. Si no me mata apenas me vea.

translation.en: She was the one who introduced me to music.
translation.es: Ella me introdujo a la música.

translation.en: When I left my clan to become a bard, she was banished.
translation.es: Cuando me fui para ser bardo, la desterraron.

translation.en: Forced to become a sellsword.
You're willing to risk your throat?
We want vengeance? We need her.
She have a name, then?
This sword mother of yours.
Last of the Ghost Tribe.
translation.es: La última de la Tribu Fantasma.

translation.en: Ghost Tribe are a myth.
No myth.
Finest sword masters to ever grace the Continent.
translation.es: Eran los mejores espadachines del Continente.

translation.en: Till you lot wiped them out.
Before my time, then.
translation.es: Quizá fue antes de que naciera.

translation.en: When they refused to fight for him,
translation.es: Cuando se negaron a luchar por él,

translation.en: your King Darach poisoned their water supply.
translation.es: tu rey Darach envenenó sus reservas de agua.

translation.en: Scían was the only survivor.
Our clan found her, took her in as sword master…
translation.es: Nuestro clan la acogió como maestra.

translation.en: Please. We mean you no harm.
What brings you so far from the main roads?
translation.es: ¿Qué los trae tan lejos de los caminos?

translation.en: We fled Bon Machán.
Our mages and elders refused the new empire.
translation.es: Nuestros ancianos rechazaron al imperio nuevo.

translation.en: Her soldiers burnt it to ash,
stole our young to dig up their black towers.
translation.es: y forzaron a los jóvenes a desenterrar sus torres.

translation.en: To raise monoliths.
Why are they raising them outside Xin'trea?
translation.es: ¿Por qué los levantan afuera de Xin'trea?

translation.en: Are you the Lark?
I don't go by that name anymore.
I saw you last year at the Aedd Gynvael.
translation.es: Te vi el año pasado en el Aedd Gynvael.

translation.en: You were brilliant.
Those songs,
so full of hope, made us feel special.
translation.es: tan llenas de esperanza, nos hicieron sentir especiales.

translation.en: Like the world was ours.
translation.es: Como si el mundo fuera nuestro.

translation.en: Any chance you could sing The Black Rose? We could use a bit of hope.
translation.es: ¿Podrías cantar La Rosa Negra? Nos vendría bien algo de esperanza.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black Rose… ♪
That's enough.
Good luck.
♪ We are the Black Rose ♪
♪ Rise up And let them hear… ♪
translation.es: Levántense, y que escuchen nuestro rugido.

translation.en: He had heard that song far south in Xin'trea,
translation.es: Fjall había escuchado esa canción al sur en Xin'trea,

translation.en: hummed in doorways,
sung in streets and taverns, always amongst the lowborn.
translation.es: y cantada en calles y tabernas de la baja cuna.

translation.en: And now here in the far north.
translation.es: Y ahora la escuchó aquí en el norte.

translation.en: How could one song have this much power?
translation.es: ¿Cómo puede una canción tener tanto poder?

translation.en: We're not far from her. Tread lightly if you can.
translation.es: Ya estamos cerca. Pisa con cuidado si puedes.

translation.en: This Scían,
the paranoid type, then?
Her entire tribe was poisoned.
Pit trap.
It's not my first time out, Lark.
translation.es: No es la primera vez que salgo.

translation.en: I seen it.
And the one 30 paces back.
translation.es: Y la que estaba más atrás.

translation.en: She'll have to try a lot harder than that to catch me--
- - Fuck's sake.
The clans are gone.
How are you still alive?
I sense the echo of slaughter on you.
translation.es: Siento el eco de la masacre en ti.

translation.en: The beast I gifted you gave you what you wanted.
translation.es: La bestia que te regalé te dio lo que querías.

translation.en: It did.
I've taken control of the entire Continent.
translation.es: Tomé el control de todo el Continente.

translation.en: And yet?
It's not enough.
These people will never accept me as their emperor.
translation.es: Esta gente nunca me aceptará como su emperador.

translation.en: I'm lowborn.
Interesting…
I need a power that only I can wield.
translation.es: Necesito un poder que solo yo pueda usar.

translation.en: One that raises me above any highborn, royal, or army.
translation.es: Que me diferencie de la nobleza, la realeza o el ejército.

translation.en: You want to be a god amongst elves.
translation.es: Quieres ser un dios entre los elfos.

translation.en: Yes.
I need… your Chaos magic.
Are you willing to sacrifice anything for it,
translation.es: ¿Estás dispuesto a sacrificar lo que sea?

translation.en: no matter what the cost?
Yes.
Whatever you ask for,
you shall have.
Never thought you'd darken this place again.
translation.es: Nunca pensé que volverías a venir aquí.

translation.en: Didn't mean to bring you dishonor.
And yet you did.
The new empress wants you dead. Why have you come?
translation.es: La nueva emperatriz te quiere muerta. ¿A qué viniste?

translation.en: To ask for your help.
Come with us.
We're riding to Xin'trea to kill her.
If not for me, then for your ancestors.
translation.es: Si no lo haces por mí, hazlo por tus ancestros.

translation.en: Xin'trea stole your tribe's sacred blade.
translation.es: Robaron la espada sagrada de tu tribu.

translation.en: This is your chance to reclaim Soulreaver.
Who knows where it is now?
Your blade's with the other trophies in the palace.
translation.es: Está con los otros trofeos en el palacio.

translation.en: Three green stones like that, and markings on the pommel,
translation.es: Tiene tres piedras verdes como esas y marcas en el pomo.

translation.en: something about…
Black Sands.
Born of Black Sands.
Blade and soul as one.
All beginnings.
All ends.
You'd never get past the city gates.
translation.es: No podrás ni entrar a la ciudad.

translation.en: If you even make it that far travelling with the enemy.
translation.es: Si es que logras llegar tan lejos viajando con el enemigo.

translation.en: Knitbone.
It'll ease the burn.
You can't trust her.
She has an axe to grind with you.
She's got contacts from sellswording across the land. Contacts we may need.
translation.es: Conoce a muchos mercenarios que podríamos necesitar.

translation.en: Contacts she'll use to sell you out the first chance she gets.
translation.es: O con los que podría traicionarte.

translation.en: There's no one else left.
Scían's all I've got.
These changing skies bode a darkness.
We have a chance if we do it together.
Your quest is hopeless.
- I need you. We need you. - You have your own path to take.
translation.es: - Te necesitamos. - Tienes tu propio camino que recorrer.

translation.en: I can get us past the gates and into the palace.
There's a secret passage into the city that's unguarded.
translation.es: Hay una entrada secreta que no está vigilada.

translation.en: We could use your sword.
No doubt you could.
But…
I won't be going with you.
The only good thing that's come of all this
translation.es: Lo único bueno de todo esto

translation.en: is that Dog Clan's gone for good.
translation.es: es el fin del Clan del Perro.

translation.en: And may your father suffer eternity in a lonely grave.
translation.es: Ojalá tu padre sufra por siempre en una tumba solitaria.

translation.en: My father should have finished King Darach's work.
translation.es: Mi padre debió terminar el trabajo del rey Darach

translation.en: Put you down with the rest of your tribe.
translation.es: y matarte junto con tu tribu.

translation.en: I would have liked to see him try.
translation.es: Me habría gustado ver cómo lo intentaba.

translation.en: Blindsided by a sweet little princess,
not fit to hold an axe of a clan chieftain.
translation.es: No era apto para tener el hacha de un cacique.

translation.en: - What are you doing? - He's the one with an axe.
translation.es: - ¿Qué haces? - Él es el que tiene un hacha.

translation.en: Doesn't seem to know how to use it, though.
translation.es: Aunque parece que no sabe usarla.

translation.en: Scían, stop!
You've gotten rusty.
Have I?
Your instincts are good, but you let your emotions control you.
translation.es: Tus instintos son buenos, pero tus emociones te controlan.

translation.en: And you, you have forgotten how to work as part of a clan.
translation.es: Y tú olvidaste cómo trabajar como parte de un clan.

translation.en: You're not bad when you're working together.
translation.es: No son malos cuando trabajan juntos.

translation.en: We can work with that.
So you're coming with us?
The ancestors will it.
translation.es: Es el deseo de mis ancestros.

translation.en: Three against an empire.
Not enough. We need to find more.
Then we'll find others who want to kill the bitch.
translation.es: Hallaremos a otros que quieran matarla.

translation.en: There'll be no coming back.
And so two became three.
translation.es: Y, así, dos se convirtieron en tres.

translation.en: The first drops in a torrent that would change the world forever.
translation.es: Las primeras gotas de un torrente que cambiaría el mundo para siempre.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black Rose ♪
♪ Let no one doubt our cause ♪
translation.es: Que nadie dude de nuestra causa.

translation.en: ♪ Rise up and let them feel our thorns ♪
♪ And freedom will be ours ♪
♪ We are the Black- Thorned Rose ♪
♪ Singin' songs for the unsung ♪
♪ Rise up and let them hear our roar ♪
translation.es: Levántense, y que escuchen nuestro rugido.

translation.en: ♪ The lowborns' day has come ♪
translation.es: Llegó el día de la baja cuna.

translation.en: ♪ The flowers shall grow ♪ ♪ Where our peasant blood flows ♪
translation.es: Una flor crecerá donde fluye nuestra sangre campesina.

translation.en: ♪ Our lives they have taken ♪ ♪ Are the seeds they have sown ♪
translation.es: Tomaron nuestras vidas y esparcieron nuestras semillas.

translation.en: ♪ Rise up from the soil we till ♪
♪ Rise up from the soil that they own ♪
translation.es: Levántense del suelo que les pertenece.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black Rose ♪
♪ Let no one doubt our cause ♪
translation.es: Que nadie dude de nuestra causa.

translation.en: ♪ Rise up and let them feel our thorns ♪
translation.es: Levántense y déjenlos sentir nuestras espinas

translation.en: ♪ So freedom may be ours ♪
translation.es: para que la libertad sea nuestra.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black- Thorned Rose ♪
♪ Singin' songs for the unsung ♪
♪ Rise up and let them hear our roar ♪
translation.es: Levántense, y que escuchen nuestro rugido.

translation.en: ♪ The lowborns' day has come ♪
translation.es: Llegó el día de la baja cuna.

translation.en: ♪ For each rose they cut down ♪
♪ Another will grow ♪
♪ Till the land is covered With petals like snow ♪
translation.es: Hasta que la tierra esté cubierta de pétalos como la nieve.

translation.en: ♪ No lights in your castles No light in your gold ♪
translation.es: Sin luz en sus castillos ni luz en su oro.

translation.en: ♪ Our fight is undying Our truth will be told ♪
translation.es: Nuestra lucha es eterna, nuestra verdad será contada.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black Rose ♪
♪ Let no one doubt our cause ♪
translation.es: Que nadie dude de nuestra causa.

translation.en: ♪ Rise up and let them feel our thorns ♪
♪ And freedom will be ours ♪
♪ We are the Black- Thorned Rose ♪
♪ Singin' songs for the unsung ♪
♪ Rise up and let them hear our roar ♪
translation.es: Levántense, y que escuchen nuestro rugido.

translation.en: ♪ The lowborns' day has come ♪
translation.es: Llegó el día de la baja cuna.

translation.en: ♪ We are the Black- Thorned Rose ♪
♪ Let our voice be our blade as one ♪
translation.es: Que nuestra voz sea nuestra espada.

translation.en: ♪ Rise up and let them feel our thorns ♪
translation.es: Levántense y déjenlos sentir nuestras espinas.

translation.en: ♪ The lowborns' day has come ♪
translation.es: Llegó el día de la baja cuna.
